content: **set of knitted jumpsuit with raglan and crochet teddy bear for baby and children in drops merino extra fine** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design model no me-043-by + me-028-by -------------------------------------------------------- **jumpsuit** **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measurements bust 50-56-62 68-74 cm / 19¾ -22 -24⅜ 26¾ -29⅛ full length 45-53-62 68-77 cm / 17¾ -21 -24⅜ 26¾ -30⅜ **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 300-300-350-400-400 g color no 15 light gray/green drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 4 5 mm / us 7 - or size needed to get correct gauge drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 3 5 mm / us 4 for rib drops wooden button burnt no 503 5-6-8 8-9 pcs pattern links french version 1 see teddy bear 2 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b20&d_id=23 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b20-26-bear-with-hearts
